weapon.name: Parachute
weapon.description: Deployed when the tank falls. Prevents the tank from taking falling damage. Parachutes must be enbabled before they are effective.

weapon.name: Battery
weapon.description: Used to re-charge tank life. Giving more health and longer shots.

weapon.name: Fuel
weapon.description: Allows the tank to move. When it is the players turn the tank may choose to move rather than fire.

weapon.name: Auto Defense
weapon.description: Allows the tank to raise shields and activate parachutes before the tanks main move.

weapon.name: Napalm
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes into a river of flame. Any tanks near the flames will loose life.

weapon.name: Hot Napalm
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes into a large river of flame. Any tanks near the Any flames near tanks will remove life.

weapon.name: Baby Missile
weapon.description: A small explosive projectile weapon

weapon.name: Missile
weapon.description: A mid-size explosive projectile weapon

weapon.name: Baby Nuke
weapon.description: A large explosive projectile weapon

weapon.name: Nuke
weapon.description: A very large explosive projectile weapon

weapon.name: Leap Frog
weapon.description: An explosive projectile weapon. When the warhead explodes it creates other small warheads that continue in the same direction as the original.

weapon.name: Dirt Clod
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes making a small mound of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to cover them.

weapon.name: Dirt Ball
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes making a medium mound of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to cover them.

weapon.name: Ton Of Dirt
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes making a large mound of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to cover them.

weapon.name: Riot Bomb
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes removing a small amount of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to remove earth from under them.

weapon.name: Hvy Riot Bomb
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes removing a large amount of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to remove earth from under them.

weapon.name: Baby Digger
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some small riot bombs.

weapon.name: Digger
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some riot bombs.

weapon.name: Heavy Digger
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating many small riot bombs.

weapon.name: Baby Sandhog
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some small burrowing missiles. These missiles target nearby tanks.

weapon.name: Sandhog
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some burrowing missiles. These missiles target nearby tanks.

weapon.name: Heavy Sandhog
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating many burrowing missiles. These missiles target nearby tanks.

weapon.name: MIRV
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases several small warheads. These warheads fan out in a straight line from the direction of the firer.

weapon.name: Spread MIRV
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases several small warheads. These warheads fan out in a random direction.

weapon.name: Death's Head
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases many large warheads. These warheads fan out in a random direction.

weapon.name: Funky Bomb
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that on exploding releases many small missiles. These missiles automatically target nearby tanks.

weapon.name: Tracer
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that causes no damage. Can be used to determine range without wasting other weapons. Leaves a marker at the final position.

weapon.name: Smoke Tracer
weapon.description: A projectile weapon that causes no damage. Can be used to determine range without wasting other weapons. Leaves a colored trace of the shot path.

weapon.name: Shield
weapon.description: A small defensive shield that protects the tank from small amounts of damage. Shields must be activated before they work.

weapon.name: Heavy Shield
weapon.description: A large defensive shield that protects the tank from small amounts of damage. Shields must be activated before they work.

weapon.name: Force Shield
weapon.description: A small reflective shield that protects the tank from large amounts of damage. Force shields reflect any shots that hit them. Shields must be activated before they work.

weapon.name: Mag Deflect
weapon.description: A small reflective shield that protects the tank from small amounts of damage. Mag shields reflect any shots that hit them but only from above. Shields must be activated before they work.

weapon.name: Heavy Mag
weapon.description: A large reflective shield that protects the tank from small amounts of damage. Mag shields reflect any shots that hit them but only from above. Shields must be activated before they work.
